name: marrow

marrow noun
(TISSUE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] (also bone marrow) soft tissue containing a lot of fat in the centre of a bone

marrow noun
(VEGETABLE)
[ C or U ] UK a long round vegetable with a thick green or yellow skin, white flesh, and a lot of seeds at its centre. Marrows are a type of squash.
Dougal Waters/DigitalVision/GettyImages
